game_description: Children of Fafnir is a wholesome puzzle platformer where you must rescue a bunch of tiny dragons. Solve simple but satisfying puzzles by manipulating physics objects and controlling tiny dragons over a collection of fractured floating islands. Enjoy nice scenery, solve puzzles, save adorable dragons and experience a mysterious ending. This is an early access demo version containing 7 levels, representing the first area of the game and accounting for roughly 45 minutes to 1 hour of gameplay. The game is under active development and feedback is very welcome!
